title: Carhartt Men's Fort Plaid Long Sleeve Shirt
features: Garment washed for a soft finish and reduced shrinkage
Two chest pockets with mitered flaps and button closures
description: This plaid, long-sleeve chambray shirt is garment washed for softness and reduced shrinkage in the wash. Relaxed fit • 4.8-Ounce, 100 percent cotton ring spun chambray • garment washed for a soft finish and reduced shrinkage • button-down collar • two chest pockets with mitered flaps and button closures • two-button adjustable cuffs with extended plackets • shoulder pleats for ease of movement • Carhartt-strong triple-stitched main seams • replaces 102816• imported
